page.title: 08TRANSPORT & PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: { Transport:}The area has 2 major 'A' roads running through it, linking Worcester and Ledbury to Hereford. Cars provide the most important form of private transport. Bus services regularly run through the area on the main roads.The nearest railway station is found in Hereford although the line runs through the area. { Police:}There is one Police Station at Bartestree which serves the whole area. It is run by P.C.Williams on a half day basis, although he is on 24 hour call. Any criminals would be taken to Hereford police station. { Fire:}The area is served by 3 possible fire stations, Hereford, Ledbury and Fownhope. { Ambulance:}Emergency medical attention is provided in Hereford. Transport would be in the form of an ambulance.
